meanings.definition: Four identical copies or instances of something.
meanings.sent1: She needed quadruplicates of the report for each team member.
meanings.sent2: The printer produced quadruplicates of the document for distribution.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's desk was overflowing with quadruplicates of student assignments.
meanings.sent4: His love for music was like quadruplicates of a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: The field was filled with quadruplicates of colorful flowers, creating a stunning sight.

meanings.definition: To make four identical copies or instances of something.
meanings.sent1: He quadruplicates important documents to ensure everyone has a copy.
meanings.sent2: The artist quadruplicates his paintings to sell them in different markets.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly said she could quadruplicate herself to finish all the work.
meanings.sent4: The chef's skill quadruplicates the taste of his signature dish.
meanings.sent5: The magician seemed to quadruplicate the playing card in his hand, amazing the audience.
